actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow certain partnerships and partners to continue to report income on the cash method.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow certain partnerships engaged in farming to elect to compute their income from farming under both the accrual method of accounting and the method used in the year preceding the year the accrual method became a requirement.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow certain partnerships and partners to continue to report income on the cash method.
